titles.title: Z's to A's Act
To provide grants to local educational agencies that agree to begin school for secondary students after 9:00 in the morning.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/29/2001--Introduced. Z's to A's Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to local educational agencies that agree to begin school for secondary students after nine o'clock in the morning.
